title: [VISUAL BUG] Malzahar- Snow Day Malzahar skin - voidling doesnt have texture
body:
On Malzahar with the Snow Day skin when teleporting to base the zergling he summons in the teleportation is missing his skin.

1. Teleport back to base
2. Happens everytime, every single game.

replies.body:
Hey MysticReptile - 

Thanks for the report! This has been a known issue. Lemme poke the people working on this to see where it's at.
Ik it pisses me off but since its malz it wont get fixed till his rework XD
Not necessarily! :P We're working on it!
